language-server-protocol-explained.title: language server protocol explained
language-server-protocol-explained.intro: Language server protocol (LSP) is a protocol for both programming languages and text editors. This session introduces what kind of features LSP offers and how it can be implemented on the IDEs and possibly languages.
language-server-protocol-explained.addition: * Audience: text editor plugin hackers, language tool hackers, language designers and all those wannabees
